wasara gananawak thisse pawathi sakachchawalin kisidu prathipalayak nolath heyin uthuru koriyawa samanga ganudenu kirimedi “hariyanne ekama kramayak pamanak” bawa amarikanu janadhipathi donald tramp pawasayi.twitar paniwidayak magin mema anathuru angawima karamin ohu thawaduratath ehi sandahan kara aththe wasara 25k thisse janadhipathiwarun uthuru koriyawa samanga sakachcha kara athi namuth in palak nowu bawaya.ohu prakasha karana paridi “hariyana ekama kramaya” kumakdayi janadhipathi tramp wisin pahadili karanu laba natha.uthuru koriyawe nyashtika wadasatahana arambaaya derata athara wag sangramayak siduwemin pawathina athara uthuru koriyawe misayila athhada balima nathara karana lesata amarikawa bala karamin siti.
